flawed_nl_solution:
Single layer cake slices cost $4 x 7 = $<<4*7=28>>28.
Double layer cake slices cost $7 x 5 = $<<7*5=53>>53.
All the cake slices together cost $28 + $53 = $<<28+53=81>>81.
He will receive change of $100 - $81 = $<<100-81=19>>19.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
